column4: I am trying to make 802.1x connection, once I enable the security option in the nm-connection-editor the apply button get disabled, any idea ?
is this wireless or wired?
it is wired
You are connecting to a dto1x enabled switch?
I am using it in a campus and I am not sure about their infrastructure, but they use TTLS, PAP, cacert.pem files
Do you not get on the network without .1x?
no, I can not connect in other methods, no IP given to undefined hosts
hmm which version of ubuntu is this?
I have an old computer that was upgraded and it connects without problems, which mean that there is no problem in the network
I think the problem is in the UI that it disables the apply button for no reason, do you have any idea how can I add a connection not using the interface ?
what you could do is manually modify the entry in gconf-editor and copy the settings from the laptop that works
in the gconf-editor you can see the connections listed under system->networking->connections
thanks very much, I was searching for the options in some file in the home folder. :)
because it uses gconf you can copy the xml file from the .gconf folders
no networking under system in gconf-editor !
uh oh that doesn't sound good
do you have any created connections?
yep, default one without security options
try adding another one and see if it creates it.. also you don't happen to be running this as super user?
thanks :), it works after the first connection, I think because the first one was made automatically :)
glad I could help
